message: Another year of success and happiness has passed. With every New Year comes greater challenges and obstacles in life. Student Welfare Group (SWG) IIT Kharagpur wishes you courage, hope and faith to overcome all of the hurdles you may face. May you have a great year and a wonderful time ahead.

Christmas gives us the opportunity to pause and reflect on the important things around us - a time when we can look back on the year that has passed and prepare for the year ahead.
Student Welfare Group (SWG) IIT Kharagpur wishes everyone Merry Christmas! :)

Mimamsa IISER Pune shared a post to Student Welfare Group (SWG) IIT Kharagpur's timeline. #Mimamsa2018 The wait is almost over! Registrations open now for the tenth edition of India's biggest Scientific quizzing event. Register in teams of four, at : http://mimamsa.iiserpune.ac.in/ Inviting all first, second and third year undergraduates. Registration portal will be active from 7th November to 20th December, 2017. Hurry! Cash prizes worth ₹1,15,000 to be won! #AreYouInquizitive #TenYearsOfMimamsa

YourDost is finally here guys!

YourDOST is an online counseling and emotional support platform designed to foster mental wellness

Here are the steps you need to follow for registration:
1) Please visit the site(www.yourdost.com).
Make sure you are connected to the IIT kgp wifi, only then you access the services for free. Although once you are registered from here, you can use its services from anywhere. 
2) You can sign up with any email id and put up any username of your choice. There are various career experts, life coaches and counsellors present. You can anonymously chat with any of them.
3) Voice call and video call can also be arranged by booking an appointment from website itself. 

Every chat, voice and video call is accessible and it's totally an anonymous platform.

In our series of foresight posts to help the people sitting for the placements this season , here comes the interview of Annu Goel who got placed at Intel.
In our series of foresight posts to help the people sitting for the placements this season , here comes the interview of Annu Goel who got placed at Intel.

Placement season is here again and in our bid to provide more information based career decisions to the student community and increase overall awareness, we present our next post, in which Naman Bhatia  talks about his placement experience, preparation, working condition in Credit Suisse and what not?
We thank Naman Bhatia for such a insightful post and hope him best of luck ahead, and to all of you guys sitting for placement🙂
